title: Leeds United Live: Watford 1-0 Leeds - BBC News
summary: all the action and reaction as leeds united take on watford in the fa cup .
leeds have n't reached the fa cup quarter-finals since 2003 .
scott wootton own goal puts watford ahead .

documents.title: good eveningwatford 1-0 leeds
text: that 's the end of leeds united 's fa cup run this season , and it 's ended in horribly farcical fashion .
scott wootton 's own goal was the difference between the two sides , but leeds will be disappointed with their second half performance .
you can listen to our post-match interview with steve evans here .
we 'll be back on tuesday for the championship game against fulham .
until then , thanks for joining us and have a lovely saturday night .

documents.title: noel on the squadwatford 1-0 leeds
text: managers have different opinions of players and that is the problem .
with botaka , he was n't bought by evans , he was brought in by uwe rosler .
if carayol had been fit , i really do n't think he would have been here .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: noel on the own goalwatford 1-0 leeds
text: everyone makes mistakes , but there 's many aspects out there that need improving .
it has to be a collective job for everyone to take blame - the cross could have been cleared better , it could have been stopped by silvestri better , wootton could have cleared it better .
but if we 're not going to start creating chances , we 're not going to win any games .
now is the time to get back to basics and learn how to score goals .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: full time : watford 1-0 leeds
text: scott wootton 's own goal has knocked leeds out of the fa cup .
what a horrible way to lose a game .
watford , truth be told , dominated the second half of the game after a strong first half from leeds .
leeds were struggling to contain them and then looked lost once the goal had gone in .
let us know your thoughts , leeds fans , by tweeting us @ twitterid

text: there 's a chance for leeds to scrabble a late equaliser , but souleymane doukara 's shot is blocked away by costel pantilimon .

documents.title: watford 1-0 leeds
text: there 's a cheer from the watford fans as they think etienne capoue has equalised , but the referee had blown his whistle .
there was a foul on charlie taylor by troy deeney , meaning that 's disallowed goal for watford and boos for the referee from the watford faithful .

documents.title: watford 1-0 leeds
text: close again for watford as almen abdi charges at leeds and just keeps going .
he found space , charged into the box and shot at marco silvestri but the ball rose just over the bar .
watford are well on top now .

documents.title: watford 1-0 leeds
text: watching that again , that 's not great from marco silvestri , who had no idea where anyone was .
scott wootton was trying to turn it out for a corner but it 's missed his foot and bounded in off his knee .
not great .

documents.title: breakinggoal watford : watford 1-0 leeds
text: what a way to go behind in a game - via scott wootton 's knee .
watford win another corner and after a bit of jumping around the ball lands for ben watson .
watson swings in a cross , marco silvestri stays where he is and wootton , trying to clear , knees the ball past silvestri and into the net .
oops .

documents.title: watford 0-0 leeds
text: it 's banging it down at vicarage road , along with a nasty wind that 's swept a few beach balls onto the pitch .
the wind is in watford 's favour though , as marco silvestri has to take a few attempts to clear .

documents.title: leeds and the fa cupwatford 0-0 leeds
text: this is only the second fifth round appearance for leeds in a decade .
leeds have won just three of their last 11 games in all competition , but two of those victories came in the fa cup , which is a good start .
the last time leeds reached the quarter finals in 2003 , they were knocked out by sheffield united in the 77th minute .

after having a player sent off , and then reprieved when the referee realised it was a case of mistaken identity , leeds were left gutted when steve kabba 's ten-yard strike sealed their fa cup fate .

documents.title: noel on the first halfwatford 0-0 leeds
text: we 've put them under pressure but watford have had the best chance .
leeds do look dangerous in and around the box but they need to be a bit cleverer in how they play the ball .
they are very good on the counter-attack but when we 've turned them , they do n't look comfortable facing their own goal .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: half time : watford 0-0 leeds
text: that 's not a bad first half from leeds - they grew into it as the game went on and they 've seen off some early watford challenges .
the watford fans are n't impressed , as a few boos follow their team off the pitch , but leeds fans will be the happier of the two .

documents.title: watford 0-0 leeds
text: lewis cook swings the corner in , but it 's a poor one and watford head it away .
we 've got a minute of added time ahead .

documents.title: watford 0-0 leeds
text: that 's better from leeds , as stuart dallas drives into the box and looks to get a shot off .
it 's from his weaker foot and watford deflect it out for a corner , but they did n't know too much about that .

documents.title: watford 0-0 leeds
text: for all leeds have done well , they really need to shove more players into the box .
stuart dallas wins a free-kick but there 's no-one there to swing it in to .

documents.title: watford 0-0 leeds
text: a good save from marco silvestri denies juan carlos paredes .
lovely ball from troy deeney set paredes up nicely but silvestri kept his head and collected the low cross .

documents.title: watford 0-0 leeds
text: souleymane doukara has had a really good first half as another clearance allows leeds to break .
charlie taylor is in the box but his shot is too straight and costel pantilimon collects it easily .

documents.title: watford 0-0 leeds
text: liam bridcutt is caught in possession but he manages to win it back .
watford pack their half with players before jose holebas goes charging up the pitch .
there 's a foul on stuart dallas , though , and that 's a free-kick .

documents.title: watford 0-0 leeds
text: mirco antenucci wins leeds a free kick as craig cathcart runs right through him .
there 's a yellow card waved and the free-kick comes to nothing .

documents.title: watford 0-0 leeds
text: it 's all watford so far but leeds are holding firm where are all the # facup goals today ?

documents.title: watford 0-0 leeds
text: souleymane doukara rounds three players and there 's some nice one-two between him and stuart dallas , before dallas shoots wide of the goal .
costel pantilimon was scrambling as he lost sight of dallas , but the shot was well wide .

documents.title: watford 0-0 leeds
text: leeds are trying their best but watford just look quicker and sharper when they get in possession .
lewis cook 's legs do the trick though as he defends away another watford corner .

documents.title: watford 0-0 leeds
text: mirco antenucci comes driving up the pitch , sees off the watford defence , before playing it inside to stuart dallas and straight into costel pantilimon 's arms .
there was n't much power in that pass but that was a decent run from antenucci .

documents.title: watford 0-0 leeds
text: giuseppe bellusci has up the first yellow of the season , and that 's a two match ban for the leeds man now .
needless really as well , as he tried to stop watford taking a throw-in .
he 's stewing .

text: leeds do n't clear a watford throw in and marco silvestri , coming out of his net , punches it straight into watford 's path .
there 's a bit of footsie as no-one can clear and no-one can get a shot on target , before sol bamba 's legs denies almen abdi 's drive .

documents.title: watford 0-0 leeds
text: the watford mascot is running around banging a drum on the sidelines .
if nothing else , i 'm enjoying the visual of a massive bee playing a genesis-style drum solo .
miguel britos briefly gets away from sol bamba and sets up jose holebas .
holebas fizzes in a shot , but it takes a deflection and it 's out for , you guessed it , another corner .

documents.title: watford 0-0 leeds
text: leeds have switched , with sol bamba marking miguel britos after he ran rings around giuseppe bellusci .
there 's another corner , this time for watford , and it 's sent in and straight back out into the crowd .

text: its leeds ' turn to win a corner this time as mirco antenucci comes running down the right .
charlie taylor swings it in under the bar and it 's well collected by the giant costel pantilimon .

documents.title: noel on today 's teamwatford v leeds
text: cooper has been the best centre-half all season so he will be a big miss , but it gives bamba something to prove .
we have to do a job and we have to be disciplined and aggressive .
it 's a skiddy surface and we should really be testing the keeper , looking for the rebounds , and trying to build something .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: head to headwatford v leeds
text: troy deeney 's dad might be a leeds fan , but that has n't stopped his son slotting six past united in his last six games against them .
in fact , watford have scored nine in their last five matches against leeds - although leeds have scored at least once in those games .
it 's the first time in five seasons that watford have reached the fifth round , but they are unbeaten in their last nine fixtures against leeds .
feeling confident , leeds fans ?

documents.title: reminder of the teamswatford v leeds
text: today 's teamsheet @ twitterid v @ twitterid commentary 92.4fm freeview ch719 & ( uk ) @ twitterid # lufc

documents.title: last time outwatford v leeds
text: leeds fans might still be haunted by the last time they faced watford at elland road , when the visitors fought back from 2-0 to claim a 3-2 win .
billy sharp put his side in front inside seven minutes , before rodolph austin 's volley put them two up .
it was that man troy deeney who pulled one back for watford before the break , but leeds still went into half-time the more confident of the two .
queue matej vydra , who equalised before firing marco silvestri 's rebound past him in the 81st minute to secure watford 's victory .
ouch .

documents.title: eye on the oppositionwatford v leeds
text: watford were leeds ' opponents on the day massimo cellino completed his takeover of elland road back in 2014 .
since then , the fortunes of the two clubs , both under italian ownership , have varied wildly .
watford won promotion to the premier league last season , and they 've gone from strength to strength this season .
troy deeney and odion ighalo have scored 24 goals between them this season , while watford 's defence have conceded 28 goals in 26 games .
it 'll be a tough ask for leeds to come out on top today .

documents.title: popey on today 's gamewatford v leeds
text: troy deeney was always the watford player who i felt comfortable about stepping up into the premier league .
he has six goals in his last six appearances against leeds and he also scored the winner for walsall against united seven years ago in league one !
leeds still owe watford for a 6-1 beating at elland road three years ago .
most of all , leeds owe their fans a performance after two wretched displays at vicarage road in the past couple of seasons !
author: Adam Pope
BBC West Yorkshire Sport

documents.title: protests , sky and the football leaguewatford v leeds
text: it 's been an interesting week off the field for leeds , with massimo cellino once again at the centre of it .
a visually impressive £ 2,600 protest on monday saw messages from the time to go massimo group beamed on to the side of the east stand .
after the game , the yorkshire evening post revealed that leeds had had the option to reschedule monday 's game for an early saturday kick-off - and they had turned it down .

the football league had already had to take a legal injunction out to get leeds to go ahead with the fixture , and with leeds keen to halt the football league 's hold over television rights , this one will rumble on and on

documents.title: building for the future ? watford v leeds
text: on the squad front , steve evans has ruled out kyle lafferty as an emergency loan signing , but he 's still hoping to strengthen his squad .
`` if we bring anyone in , they have to be part of building a team for next season , '' he said .
`` we want to help out plan going forward .
we 're not just here to get someone fit for the euros .
`` i want to win as much as our supporters and i want to win every game .
but , i want to make sure we are building a team for next season . ''
thoughts on that , leeds fans ?

documents.title: pintsize previewwatford v leeds
text: pintsize preview : watford v leeds united # lufc

documents.title: `` the fa cup makes for a magical season '' watford v leeds
text: steve evans told bbc radio leeds this week that - cliche klaxons at the ready - the club are embracing the magic of the cup .
`` any football club , if you can get a run in the fa cup , it makes for a magical season , '' evans told katherine hannah .
`` it 's a competition that everyone wants to do well in and it 's one we have n't done well in for a number of years .
this club deserves to play in big games and saturday is a big game .
`` this club should be playing big games against premier league clubs all week .
you are where you are for a reason .
we have a lot of work to do to get there . ''

documents.title: popey 's fa cup memorieswatford v leeds
text: the first fa cup final i ever went to was when watford were beaten , and well beaten at that , 2-0 by everton .
it was all about elton john - but there was no need to guess why they called it the blues that day .
boom boom !
author: Adam Pope
BBC West Yorkshire Sport

documents.title: watford and leeds : a brief historywatford v leeds
text: leeds and watford have never met in the fa cup before , but they have a pretty colourful history .
united last beat watford in may 2013 , in a game that watford needed to win to secure automatic promotion to the premier league .
leeds took the lead through dominic poleon , before almen abdi levelled with a 20 yard strike .
ross mccormack was then the hero , or the villain depending on your view , as he flicked a goal over the keeper in the 89th minute to secure a 2-1 win .

documents.title: breakingteam newswatford v leeds
text: steve evans has made one change to the side that faced middlesbrough on monday .
mustapha carayol and liam cooper have both up injuries , so sol bamba starts while jordan botaka is on the bench .
watford xi : pantilimon , paredes , britos , cathcart , holebas , capoue , suárez , watson , abdi , deeney , amrabat .
leeds united xi : silvestri , wootton , bellusci , bamba , taylor , bridcutt , cook , diagouraga , dallas , doukara , antenucci .

documents.title: it 's fa cup time ! watford v leeds
text: afternoon , and welcome to today 's live text commentary of leeds united 's fifth round fa cup tie with watford .
it 's been 13 years since leeds last made it to the quarter finals of the cup , and there 's just the small matter of a premier league club to get past first .
watford are ninth in the premier league , a full league and seven places above the whites .
keep an eye on us here while you listen to our commentary on 92.4 fm and freeview channel 719 to see if leeds can pull off a surprise victory .
